Summary: bright orange red object above town
divs: Sighting Detailsok. look, me and my friends were getting wasted new years eve and all of the sudden this flare like object shot up about 500 hundered feet away or so from us, east. it proceded south and followed the channel then changed directions and went east out to sea.it then changed directions again and went slightly upwards then faded out. cazy huh? i know. you would have to see it to beileve it! D-Truth.
